Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: OpenCms is a feature-rich, industrial-strength, open-source content management system. You can use it for small websites, but you can also manage complex sites, building intranet and internet web sites and so on.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: OpenCms is a feature-rich, industrial-strength, open-source content management system. It can be useful for small projects, but its strength are comprehensive intra- and internet web sites.
